channel.title: [474\508\317] Home\PVP [PI]
channel.description:
Question 1:
Ok so I have changed the home in Config.java and did not work anyone know another way?
Question 2:
Anyone know how to add a PvP area outside of varrock bank (If you could make the code for me I am trying to do Big varrock bank)?

item.title: [474\508\317] Home\PVP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:1, topic:354553”]Question 1:

Ok so I have changed the home in Config.java and did not work anyone know another way?[/quote]

Okay, change the spawn for the respawn points in there and change it for when a person logs in brand new. Then in your actionhandler.java search for “Home” then you should fin home teleports. Down a little bit should be something like triggerTeleport or something, inside those parentheses should be like EDGEVILLE_X, EDGEVILLE_Y, change those to your X and Y you put in the config.java.

(Like if you put the coords as:
HOME_X = 3333;
Home_Y = 3333;
you would put in HOME_X, HOME_Y, not the coord numbers.)

Read full topic
